title: Partial unemployment; eligibility
context: [§383-29.6] Partial unemployment; eligibility. A new claim or an initial additional claim for partial unemployment benefits may be filed as the department prescribes for any week only if the individual: (1) Is a full-time worker; (2) Is attached to a regular employer, as defined in section 383-1; (3) Worked less than or did not work the individual&rsquo;s normal, customary full-time hours, as defined in section 383-1, for that week; (4) Had no earnings or earned less than the individual&rsquo;s weekly benefit amount for that week; and (5) Was unemployed due to a lack of full-time work, as defined in section 383-1, for that week. [L 2009, c 170, pt of §2, §7; am L 2010, c 76, §3; am L 2011, c 165, §5]
